function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Purposive sampling technique used to select diverse participants may not fully represent the population and lead to biased results.","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of the situation during the pandemic and potential misinterpretation of data.","Mitigation":"Use random sampling in addition to purposive sampling to ensure more representative results.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software for data validation and comparison.","People":"Researchers, data analysts, and decision-makers relying on the study.","Owner":"Researchers, statisticians, and research ethics boards."},{"Description":"Direct communication and in-person interviews may increase the risk of disease transmission between researchers and participants.","Impact":"Potential exposure to contagious diseases such as COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Use virtual communication methods and adhere to strict infection control guidelines for in-person interviews.","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, personal protective equipment (PPE).","People":"Researchers, participants, and healthcare staff.","Owner":"Researchers, healthcare organizations, and research ethics boards."},{"Description":"Data collection conducted during the pandemic may be influenced by the rapidly evolving nature of the situation, leading to time-dependent biases.","Impact":"Data may not accurately reflect the entire pandemic period due to the changing nature of the crisis.","Mitigation":"Diversify data collection time frames and continuously update data analysis to account for changes.","Technologies":"Real-time data tracking and analysis software.","People":"Researchers, data analysts, and decision-makers.","Owner":"Data analysts, research teams, and research ethics boards."}]}
